companyInfo.name: UK DESIGNS PVT.LTD. | KRATAARTH ARCHITECTS
companyInfo.heroTitle: Simplicity Is Keynote To Great Design
companyInfo.philosophy: Good design is produced from careful study and research, combined with technical knowledge and artistic judgment. Its philosophy is built on the dual concepts of client service and design excellence.
aboutUs: UK Designs Pvt.Ltd & Krataarth Architects believes good design is produced from careful study and research, combined with technical knowledge and artistic judgment. Its philosophy is built on the dual concepts of client service and design excellence.

UK Designs Pvt.Ltd. & Krataarth Architects has undertaken a wide spectrum of projects ranging from master planning, malls, hotels, commercial & residential buildings, redevelopment projects, villas, bungalows, high-end apartments, restaurants, clubhouses & showrooms. Our emphasis lies on high quality and unique designs to create memorable design experience for our users.

We offer innovative design, expertise and practical solutions, while keeping in mind the social, economic, environmental and aesthetic issues involved. Attention to detail, proportions and scale, together with common sense ensure the finished product fully develops the potential within the concept.

Extensive use of CAD and computer 3D Modeling, which is done in house, helps the client to visualize their project in the best possible manner. Highly committed in use of computer technology, we offer full scope of design, planning and project management services with our young motivated team. Our design team has the confidence and flexibility to go outside the box.

director.name: Uday Kanadia
director.title: Director
director.bio: Gold Medalist from L.S. Raheja College of Architecture. His dynamic nature and sparkling personality reflect in his work, leaving an everlasting impression on the minds of spectators. His motto is to design, detail and enjoy working in responsive to his client's need in a very honest, efficient and professional manner. Past and current projects include master planning, malls, hotels, commercial & residential buildings, redevelopment projects, villas, bungalows, high-end apartments, restaurants, clubhouses & showrooms. He aims at transforming every site into a stimulating environment, rich in inventive detailing.

contact.address: 409, Highway commercial center, I.B.Patel Road, Laghu Udhyog, Off Western Express Highway, Goregaon (East), Mumbai-400063

projects.title: Sky Walks
projects.location: Bhandup, Mulund, Badlapur, Vidhyavihar, Thane, Kurla & Ullashnagar
projects.plotArea: All sky walk proposed on D.P. Road
projects.description: The walk ways design in structural steel, with deck sheeting on the floor with paver’s tiles to give smooth walk way for pedestrian, aesthetically cover with ACP and metal finish with paints. Design all the entry exit points with staircase.

projects.title: SVP Market
projects.description: The market planning revised as per existing shop area, all the stall redesign with the main structure with public toilet Tank, all new walkway with better services, day light sky roof, fish market proposed with platform with proper drainage.

projects.title: Grant Road Market
projects.description: The market planning revised as per existing shop area, all the stall redesign with the main structure with public toilet Tank, all new walkway with better services, day light sky roof, fish market proposed with platform with proper drainage.

projects.title: Township (Unlaunched)
projects.description: The project includes phase wise planning high end residential tower each approx. 60 floors. All residential towers with commercial development with infrastructural planning.

projects.title: Villa California
projects.constructionArea: Only Villa area approx. – 1,50,000 sq. ft
projects.description: The project includes plotting in phase one. Second phase includes residential villas plot ranging from 4000 sq. ft. to 8000 sq. ft. with individual villas with swimming pool. With public amenity like garden, roads and sever lines. The beautification of roads with plantation, street lights and monuments.

projects.description: The project includes P12 wings of low rise apartment with all the amenities from swimming pool, garden, Jain temple, ample parking space, with integrated smart city concept.
